018package org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type;
019
020import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
023import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
024import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
025
026import java.util.ArrayList;
027import java.util.Comparator;
028import java.util.List;
029
030import org.apiguardian.api.API;
031import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.UtilityClass;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.NullArgumentException;
034import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError;
035import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects;
036import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGDegree;
037import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGMillimeter;
038import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGPercent;
039import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGPixel;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.svg.type.SVGNumber.SVGUserUnitValue;
041
042/**
043 *  <p>{@summary The class {@code SVGCalculator} provide functions to perform
044 *  calculations on instances of
045 *  {@link SVGNumber }
046 *  and its subclasses.}</p>
047 *
048 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
049 *  @version $Id: SVGCalculator.java 1142 2024-06-23 20:21:35Z tquadrat $
050 *  @since 0.4.7
051 *
052 *  @UMLGraph.link
053 */
054@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: SVGCalculator.java 1142 2024-06-23 20:21:35Z tquadrat $" )
055@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
056@UtilityClass
057public final class SVGCalculator
058{
059        /*--------------*\
060    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
061        \*--------------*/
062    /**
063     *  No instance allowed for this class!
064     */
065    private SVGCalculator() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( SVGCalculator.class ); }
066
067        /*---------*\
068    ====** Methods **==========================================================
069        \*---------*/
070    /**
071     *  Adds the given values.
072     *
073     *  @param  <T> The type of the values.
074     *  @param  v1  The first value.
075     *  @param  vOther  The other values.
076     *  @return The sum.
077     *
078     *  @since  0.4.8
079     */
080    @SafeVarargs
081    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.8" )
082    public static final <T extends SVGNumber> T add( final T v1, final T... vOther )
083    {
084        var sum = requireNonNullArgument( v1, "v1" ).number().doubleValue();
085        final var unit = v1.unit();
086        for( final var v : vOther )
087        {
088            if( unit != v.unit() ) throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Invalid unit: %s".formatted( v.unit().name() ) );
089            sum += v.number().doubleValue();
090        }
091        @SuppressWarnings( "unchecked" )
092        final var retValue = (T) switch( unit )
093        {
094            case PIXEL -> new SVGPixel( sum );
095            case MILLIMETER -> new SVGMillimeter( sum );
096            case PERCENT -> new SVGPercent( sum );
097            default -> v1 instanceof SVGDegree ? new SVGDegree( sum ) : new SVGNumber( sum, unit );
098        };
099
100        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
101        return retValue;
102    }   //  add
103
104    /**
105     *  Adds the given values.
106     *
107     *  @param  v1  The first value.
108     *  @param  vOther  The other values.
109     *  @return The sum.
110     *
111     *  @since  0.4.8
112     */
113    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.8" )
114    public static final SVGDegree add( final SVGDegree v1, final SVGDegree... vOther )
115    {
116        final var sum = requireNonNullArgument( v1, "v1" ).number().doubleValue() + stream( vOther ).filter( Objects::nonNull ).mapToDouble( v -> v.number().doubleValue() ).sum();
117        final var retValue = new SVGDegree( sum );
118
119        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
120        return retValue;
121    }   //  add
122
123    /**
124     *  Adds the given values.
125     *
126     *  @param  v1  The first value.
127     *  @param  vOther  The other values.
128     *  @return The sum.
129     *
130     *  @since  0.4.8
131     */
132    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.8" )
133    public static final SVGMillimeter add( final SVGMillimeter v1, final SVGMillimeter... vOther )
134    {
135        final var sum = requireNonNullArgument( v1, "v1" ).number().doubleValue() + stream( vOther ).filter( Objects::nonNull ).mapToDouble( v -> v.number().doubleValue() ).sum();
136        final var retValue = new SVGMillimeter( sum );
137
138        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
139        return retValue;
140    }   //  add
141
142    /**
143     *  Adds the given values.
144     *
145     *  @param  v1  The first value.
146     *  @param  vOther  The other values.
147     *  @return The sum.
148     *
149     *  @since  0.4.8
150     */
151    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.8" )
152    public static final SVGPixel add( final SVGPixel v1, final SVGPixel... vOther )
153    {
154        final var sum = requireNonNullArgument( v1, "v1" ).number().doubleValue() + stream( vOther ).filter( Objects::nonNull ).mapToDouble( v -> v.number().doubleValue() ).sum();
155        final var retValue = new SVGPixel( sum );
156
157        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
158        return retValue;
159    }   //  add
160
161    /**
162     *  Adds the given values.
163     *
164     *  @param  v1  The first value.
165     *  @param  vOther  The other values.
166     *  @return The sum.
167     *
168     *  @since  0.4.8
169     */
170    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.8" )
171    public static final SVGPercent add( final SVGPercent v1, final SVGPercent... vOther )
172    {
173        final var sum = requireNonNullArgument( v1, "v1" ).number().doubleValue() + stream( vOther ).filter( Objects::nonNull ).mapToDouble( v -> v.number().doubleValue() ).sum();
174        final var retValue = new SVGPercent( sum );
175
176        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
177        return retValue;
178    }   //  add
179
180    /**
181     *  Increases the given instance of
182     *  {@link SVGNumber}
183     *  by the given increment and returns the result.
184     *
185     *  @param  <T> The type of the value.
186     *  @param  value   The value.
187     *  @param  increment   The increment.
188     *  @return The result.
189     */
190    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
191    public static final <T extends SVGNumber> T increase( final T value, final double increment )
192    {
193        final var amount = requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).number().doubleValue() + increment;
194        final var retValue = newNumber( value, amount );
195
196        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
197        return retValue;
198    }   //  increase()
199
200    /**
201     *  Returns a list built from the given values.
202     *
203     *  @param  <T> The type of the values.
204     *  @param  v1  The first value.
205     *  @param  vOther  The other values.
206     *  @return The list from the given values.
207     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    Not all values will have the same
208     *      unit.
209     */
210    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.4.10" )
211    @SafeVarargs
212    private static final <T extends SVGNumber> List<T> makeList( final T v1, final T... vOther ) throws IllegalArgumentException
213    {
214        final List<T> retValue = new ArrayList<>();
215        final var unit = requireNonNullArgument( v1, "v1" ).unit();
216        retValue.add( v1 );
217        for( final var v : requireNonNullArgument( vOther, "vOther" ) )
218        {
219            if( isNull( v ) ) throw new NullArgumentException();
220            if( unit != v.unit() ) throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Invalid unit: %s".formatted( v.unit().name() ) );
221            retValue.add( v );
222        }
223
224        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
225        return retValue;
226    }   //  makeList()
227
228    /**
229     *  Returns the greatest one of the given values.
230     *
231     *  @param  <T> The type of the values.
232     *  @param  v1  The first value.
233     *  @param  vOther  The other values.
234     *  @return The greatest value from the given values.
235     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    Not all values will have the same
236     *      unit.
237     *
238     *  @since  0.4.10
239     */
240    @SafeVarargs
241    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.10" )
242    public static final <T extends SVGNumber> T max( final T v1, final T... vOther ) throws IllegalArgumentException
243    {
244        final var buffer = makeList( v1, vOther );
245        buffer.sort( Comparator.naturalOrder() );
246        final var retValue = buffer.getLast();
247
248        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
249        return retValue;
250    }   //  max()
251
252    /**
253     *  Returns the smallest one of the given values.
254     *
255     *  @param  <T> The type of the values.
256     *  @param  v1  The first value.
257     *  @param  vOther  The other values.
258     *  @return The smallest value from the given values.
259     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    Not all values will have the same
260     *      unit.
261     *
262     *  @since  0.4.10
263     */
264    @SafeVarargs
265    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.10" )
266    public static final <T extends SVGNumber> T min( final T v1, final T... vOther ) throws IllegalArgumentException
267    {
268        final var buffer = makeList( v1, vOther );
269        buffer.sort( Comparator.naturalOrder() );
270        final var retValue = buffer.getFirst();
271
272        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
273        return retValue;
274    }   //  min()
275
276    /**
277     *  Multiplies the given instance of
278     *  {@link SVGNumber}
279     *  with the given factor and returns the result.
280     *
281     *  @param  <T> The type of the value.
282     *  @param  value   The value.
283     *  @param  factor  The factor.
284     *  @return The result.
285     */
286    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
287    public static final <T extends SVGNumber> T multiply( final T value, final double factor )
288    {
289        final var amount = requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).number().doubleValue() * factor;
290        final var retValue = newNumber( value, amount );
291
292        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
293        return retValue;
294    }   //  multiply()
295
296    /**
297     *  Creates a new instance of
298     *  {@link SVGNumber}
299     *  with the given type and amount.
300     *
301     *  @param  <T> The type of the value.
302     *  @param  value   The value.
303     *  @param  amount  The amount.
304     *  @return The result.
305     */
306    @SuppressWarnings( "unchecked" )
307    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.4.7" )
308    private static final <T extends SVGNumber> T newNumber( final T value, final double amount )
309    {
310        final var retValue = switch( requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ) )
311        {
312            case final SVGDegree $ -> (T) new SVGDegree( amount );
313            case final SVGMillimeter $ -> (T) new SVGMillimeter( amount );
314            case final SVGPercent $ -> (T) new SVGPercent( amount );
315            case final SVGPixel $ -> (T) new SVGPixel( amount );
316            case final SVGUserUnitValue $ -> (T) new SVGUserUnitValue( amount );
317            default -> (T) new SVGNumber( amount, value.unit() );
318        };
319
320        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
321        return retValue;
322    }   //  newNumber()
323
324    /**
325     *  Reduces the given instance of
326     *  {@link SVGNumber}
327     *  by the given decrement and returns the result.
328     *
329     *  @param  <T> The type of the value.
330     *  @param  value   The value.
331     *  @param  decrement   The decrement.
332     *  @return The result.
333     */
334    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
335    public static final <T extends SVGNumber> T reduce( final T value, final double decrement )
336    {
337        final var amount = requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).number().doubleValue() - decrement;
338        final var retValue = newNumber( value, amount );
339
340        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
341        return retValue;
342    }   //  reduce()
343
344    /**
345     *  Returns an instance of
346     *  {@link SVGMillimeter}
347     *  whose value corresponds with that of the given value.
348     *
349     *  @param  input   The input value.
350     *  @return The corresponding value as {@code SVGMillimeter}.
351     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given value cannot be converted
352     *      to an instance of {@code SVGMillimeter}.
353     */
354    @SuppressWarnings( {"OverlyComplexMethod", "NestedSwitchStatement"} )
355    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
356    public static final SVGMillimeter toMillimeter( final SVGNumber input )
357    {
358        final var retValue = switch( input )
359        {
360            case null -> throw new NullArgumentException( "input" );
361            case final SVGDegree ignored -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert SVGDegree to millimeter" );
362            case final SVGPercent ignored -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert SVGPercent to millimeter" );
363            case final SVGMillimeter value -> value;
364            case final SVGPixel value -> new SVGMillimeter( value.number().doubleValue() * 25.4 / 96.0 );
365            case final SVGUserUnitValue value -> new SVGMillimeter( value.number().doubleValue() * 25.4 / 96.0 );
366            default -> switch( input.unit() )
367            {
368                case INCH -> new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() * 25.4 );
369                case PICA -> new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() * 12.7 / 3.0 );
370                case POINT -> new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() * 0.352778 );
371                case CENTIMETER -> input.isInteger()
372                    ? new SVGMillimeter( input.number().longValue() * 10 )
373                    : new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() *10.0 );
374                case MILLIMETER -> input.isInteger()
375                    ? new SVGMillimeter( input.number().longValue() )
376                    : new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() );
377                case PIXEL -> new SVGMillimeter( input.number().doubleValue() * 25.4 / 96.0 );
378                default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert %s to millimeter".formatted( input.unit().name() ) );
379            };
380        };
381
382        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
383        return retValue;
384    }   //  toMillimeter()
385
386    /**
387     *  Returns an instance of
388     *  {@link SVGPixel}
389     *  whose value corresponds with that of the given value.
390     *
391     *  @param  input   The input value.
392     *  @return The corresponding value as {@code SVGMPixel}.
393     *  @throws IllegalArgumentException    The given value cannot be converted
394     *      to an instance of {@code SVGPixel}.
395     */
396    @SuppressWarnings( {"OverlyComplexMethod", "NestedSwitchStatement"} )
397    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.4.7" )
398    public static final SVGPixel toPixel( final SVGNumber input )
399    {
400        final var retValue = switch( input )
401        {
402            case null -> throw new NullArgumentException( "input" );
403            case final SVGDegree ignored -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert SVGDegree to millimeter" );
404            case final SVGPercent ignored -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert SVGPercent to millimeter" );
405            case final SVGMillimeter value -> new SVGPixel( value.number().doubleValue() * 96.0 / 25.4 );
406            case final SVGPixel value -> value;
407            case final SVGUserUnitValue value -> value.isInteger()
408                ? new SVGPixel( value.number().longValue() )
409                : new SVGPixel( value.number().doubleValue() );
410            default -> switch( input.unit() )
411            {
412                case INCH -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 96.0 );
413                case PICA -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 16.0 );
414                case POINT -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 6.0 / 8.0 );
415                case CENTIMETER -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 960.0 / 25.4 );
416                case MILLIMETER -> new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() * 96.0 / 25.4 );
417                case PIXEL -> input.isInteger()
418                    ? new SVGPixel( input.number().longValue() )
419                    : new SVGPixel( input.number().doubleValue() );
420                default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException( "Cannot convert %s to millimeter".formatted( input.unit().name() ) );
421            };
422        };
423
424        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
425        return retValue;
426    }   //  toMillimeter()
427}
428//  class SVGCalculator
429
